languages.text: {n}Соломон принимает удар не вздрогнув. По щеке расплывается алый отпечаток вашей ладони. Чуть опустив голову, Соломон глухо буркает:{/n} "Слушаюсь".
{n}Solomorne takes the blow without flinching. The scarlet imprint of your palm spreads across his cheek. With his head slightly lowered, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "As you will."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон принимает удар не вздрогнув. По щеке расплывается алый отпечаток вашей ладони. Чуть опустив голову, Соломон глухо буркает:{/n} "Слушаюсь".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne encaisse la gifle sans tressaillir. La marque rouge vif de votre main s'agrandit sur sa joue.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, » {n}murmure-t-il en inclinant légèrement la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the blow without flinching. The scarlet imprint of your palm spreads across his cheek. With his head slightly lowered, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "As you will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne encaisse la gifle sans tressaillir. La marque rouge vif de votre main s'agrandit sur sa joue.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, » {n}murmure-t-il en inclinant légèrement la tête.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはその一撃を微動だにせずに受けた。あなたの手のひらの形の紅い痕が彼の頬に広がった。わずかに頭を垂れたまま、ソロモーンは小さく呟いた。{/n}「お望みのままに」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the blow without flinching. The scarlet imprint of your palm spreads across his cheek. With his head slightly lowered, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "As you will."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはその一撃を微動だにせずに受けた。あなたの手のひらの形の紅い痕が彼の頬に広がった。わずかに頭を垂れたまま、ソロモーンは小さく呟いた。{/n}「お望みのままに」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne encaja el golpe sin inmutarse. La marca escarlata de tu mano se extiende por su mejilla. Agachando ligeramente la cabeza, Solomorne murmura:{/n} «Como desee».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the blow without flinching. The scarlet imprint of your palm spreads across his cheek. With his head slightly lowered, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "As you will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne encaja el golpe sin inmutarse. La marca escarlata de tu mano se extiende por su mejilla. Agachando ligeramente la cabeza, Solomorne murmura:{/n} «Como desee».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙毫不畏缩地挨了这个耳光，鲜红的手掌印在他的脸颊上蔓延开来。索罗蒙微微低下了头，低声开了口。{/n}“如你所愿。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the blow without flinching. The scarlet imprint of your palm spreads across his cheek. With his head slightly lowered, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "As you will."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙毫不畏缩地挨了这个耳光，鲜红的手掌印在他的脸颊上蔓延开来。索罗蒙微微低下了头，低声开了口。{/n}“如你所愿。”

languages.text: {n}Yediği tokat karşısında Solomorne'un kılı kıpırdamıyor. Yanağı, elinin iziyle kıpkırmızı kesiliyor. Başını hafifçe eğerek mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Başüstüne."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the blow without flinching. The scarlet imprint of your palm spreads across his cheek. With his head slightly lowered, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "As you will."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yediği tokat karşısında Solomorne'un kılı kıpırdamıyor. Yanağı, elinin iziyle kıpkırmızı kesiliyor. Başın hafifçe eğerek mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Başüstüne."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne erträgt die Ohrfeige ohne jede Regung. Der rote Abdruck deiner Handfläche zeichnet sich auf seiner Wange ab. Mit leicht gesenktem Kopf murmelt Solomorne:{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne takes the blow without flinching. The scarlet imprint of your palm spreads across his cheek. With his head slightly lowered, Solomorne murmurs,{/n} "As you will."
